variable.description: Form Version

variable.name: MLF2A1
variable.description: Which of the following sources did you check for hospitalizations for this patient between the randomization date and the VISP 2 year anniversary date? Your facility's medical records

variable.description: Which of the following sources did you check for hospitalizations for this patient between the randomization date and the VISP 2 year anniversary date? Local outlying hospital medical records

variable.name: MLF2A3
variable.description: Which of the following sources did you check for hospitalizations for this patient between the randomization date and the VISP 2 year anniversary date? Other
